note.p: Education: Exeter College, Oxford (matriculated 1654); Inner Temple (admitted 1656)
Career: Gentleman Usher to the Queen; Envoy extraordinary to Spain (1689-1699); Envoy to the States-General in The Hague (1699-1706)
Committee appointments include: Committee for the Histories of Trades (1664).
Other RSActivity: Reported on foreign ships, e.g. from Greenland (1663).
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; DNB (Stanhope, James; Stanhope, Philip); Foster; Hunter
